Posted By: Stephen Putman
Hello Everyone!

Up for sale are T206 Piedmont & Sweet Caporals PSA 4 VG - EX. Please email (putman2110@yahoo.com) me if you are interested. 

Prices include shipping with delivery confirmation:

Harry McIntyre 'Brooklyn & Chicago' Piedmont PSA 4 ------- $65
Ray Demmitt 'New York' Piedmont PSA 4 ------------------ $75
Bunk Congalton 'Portrait' Piedmont PSA 4 ------------------ $55
Lena Blackburne Piedmont PSA 4 --------------------------- $55
Whitey Alperman Sweet Caporal PSA 4 -------------------- $55


Please look at the 1933 Goudey PSA Set Registry #17 "Almost There" as I will be selling my entire collection. 

Payments: PayPal, money orders (preferred), and personal checks
